actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from unrelated business taxable income amounts derived by any college or university from the broadcasting of any sporting event.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from taxable unrelated income, income derived by tax exempt colleges, universities and their wholly owned corporations from the broadcasting of sporting events.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from unrelated business taxable income amounts derived by any college or university from the broadcasting of any sporting event.
